![](swpa-groundwater-2022.png)

This dataset is a subset of the Shale Network database and includes all groundwater samples from Southwestern Pennsylvania in the Shale Network database as of June 2022. [Click this link](https://doi.org/10.1021/acs.est.2c00001){target="_blank"} to access the corresponding peer-reviewed article that interprets the dataset. In addition, the dataset can be downloaded via this [data DOI](https://doi.org/10.26208/2nqe-wd53){target="_blank"}.
